org.hps.analysis.MC

Class FirstHitGBLRefitterDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.analysis.MC.FirstHitGBLRefitterDriver

  • public class FirstHitGBLRefitterDriver
extends Driver
    A Driver which refits tracks using GBL, but only refit tracks with different L1 hits from TrackRefitWithFirstLayerHits. This is adapted from the nominal GBLRefitterDriver.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.lcsim.util.Driver
